attributes.action: Maintain the BBC's commitment to public service broadcasting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British public is one of the most aware and knowledgable in the world and many people believe that this is due to the BBC's world class news and information output. With the digital switchover, the temptation will be for the BBC's programming to be more entertainment based in order to compete with the many new channels available. 
We believe that the government should commit to a high quality, advertising free BBC.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
